#summary Development environment under MS Windows


= Introduction =

This should be a good starting point for all MS Windows developers.


= Details =

Main stuff:
 * Python    http://www.python.org/download/
 * Py(Stuff) http://www.pygtk.org/downloads.html
 * GTK+      http://www.gtk.org/download.html

If you want to build the win installer you need:
 * py2exe    http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15583
 * NSIS      http://nsis.sourceforge.net/Download

And a good editor for Python and NSIS scripts is:
 Notepad++   http://notepad-plus.sourceforge.net/uk/site.htm
